name: Break a Bear
description:
A childs bedroom fulled with teddies. As a lone green soldier toy you must survive the hugs by the different teddies in this arena style first person shooter. Will you survive the mobs of fluff.

This game is a 3rd  year Digital arts project at the University of Witswaterand, produced by Luke Wardlaw, Benjamin Gudmanz and Sakhumuzi Mlangeni.

Made in Unity
